The Park of Partenio enters schools, a day of ecological awareness
05 Nov 2019, 12:39 by Redazione

Where the Comprehensive Institute ‚ÄúMons. Pasquale Guerriero ‚ÄùAvella
When From 07/11/2019 to 07/11/2019 üïó From 9 am

The Parco del Partenio organizes, for Thursday 7 November, a day of ecological awareness in Avella, addressed to the students of the Comprehensive Institute ‚ÄúMons. Pasquale Guerriero ‚Äù. The day is part of the Ente's project chaired by Francesco Iovino entitled ‚ÄúDonate a tree to your park. We sow our future ". It starts at 9 am, with an educational visit to a local beekeeping company: a moment of encounter with the beekeeper Antonio Maietta, in close contact with nature, to observe, learn about and understand the world of bees, the hectic life at the inside of the hives and the production of honey. At 11.00 the presentation of the project "Donate a tree to the Park" is scheduled, with introductory greetings from the mayor of Avella, Domenico Biancardi. The interventions of Vincenzo Gagliotta, headmaster of the "Pasquale Guerriero" are also planned; Santina Cerbone, Councilor for School Services of the Municipality of Avella; Agostino Vitale, Councilor for the Environment of the Municipality of Avella; Angelo Pedalino, collaborator of the CNR. The conclusions are entrusted to the President of the Regional Park Parco del Partenio, Francesco Iovino.
